review: My mom had been to hospital and it was for back pain related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was no waiting time when we went. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Physiotherapy was suggested and doctor was friendly. She is recovering health wise. We were not able to do follow-up post consultation.

I have consulted Dr. Ilavarasan for my mother spine and leg pain issues. The way he explained her issues and concern over prescribing the medicine and treatment is really heart melting. Really he is taking care of complete health issue before prescribing any tablet or even for ointment. Also he is explaining to patient in a better way they can understand what they can do and protect themselves in future.

After his consultation my mother and my whole family is felt really very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Known doctor , good care by both the doctors and the staffs. 
Always comfortable visiting the hospital
